The expert found no evidence of Rep: Jason Lewis advocating for a legislatively established dress code for women.
Recordings from Lewis: radio show revealed his disbelief at the idea of not being able to refer to women as "sluts" and his questioning of whether women should be held to a higher standard of modesty.
The expert noted that the claim circulat: which misrepresented Lewis' comments and implied that he had called for a dress code for American women.
